entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpeeox8a3k/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0005.49] The date of 2018-05-05 used for Financing Receivable, Transaction Costs and the Scenario [Axis] and us-gaap:ScenarioForecastMember with a value of 2,100,000 is earlier than or the same as the reporting period end date of 2018-05-05. Either remove the statement scenario axis and forecast member from this value, change the end date for the value or update the Document and Entity Information document period end date.
The properties of this sig:FinancingReceivableTransactionCosts fact are: Period: 2018-02-04 to 2018-05-05 Dimensions: us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=us-gaap:AllOtherSegmentsMember, us-gaap:StatementScenarioAxis=us-gaap:ScenarioForecastMember, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentByClassOfFinancingReceivableAxis=us-gaap:ConsumerPortfolioSegmentMember Unit: USD Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/832988/000083298818000004/sig-20180505.xml 5450
